NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: FaceLink or ProfConnect?
NC.A: {FaceLink} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: SnapFrame or FaceLink?
NC.A: {FaceLink} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: ProfConnect or SnapFrame?
NC.A: {SnapFrame} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

MSR.Q: How many ridges have their peak located to the right of the average X value across all ridges?
MSR.A: There are {0} ridges whose peaks are located to the right of the average X value.
